name: Ahmar Siddiqui
description: Ahmar kept the previous iterations of our website ticking over and handled maintainence of the Numix Store.

name: Andreas Angerer
description: Made brilliant and numerous contributions to our icon themes, especially our base theme which is the underpinning for all our app themes

name: Bilal Elmoussaoui
description: Develops Numix Folder, helps maintain Core, and the AUR packages. Also develops Hardcode Tray which makes it possible for us to theme more apps!

name: Dustin Falgout
description: Helps develop the GTK theme, maintain the AUR packages, and to top it all off develops the Antergos Linux distro.

name: Georgi Karavasilev
description: The artist behind the current designs of all our current icon themes, including Circle and Square.

name: Joern Konopka
description: Created the original Numix icon theme and got the ball rolling with the wider projects.

name: Josh Fogg
description: Handles business enquiries and oversees maintainence of the icon themes. Occasional programmer.

name: Khurshid Alam
description: Oversees maintainance of the GTK theme and lends a hand with packaging

name: Paolo Rotolo
description: Our resident Android guru and developer extrodinaire, Paolo has driven the development and maintainence of all our Android apps.

name: Sascha Spreitzer
description: Builds and maintains the packages for Fedora, Redhat, and CentOS

name: Satyajit Sahoo
description: The brains behind our GTK themes. Satya helped shape these over the years and make them into the polished product they are today.

name: Vincent Bermel
description: With over a 1000 commits to Core, Vincent is responsible for Circle and Square being the most complete themes out there.
